snippet.title: Slime Heroes - Official Release Date Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Here's a new look at gameplay and features of Slime Heroes in this trailer for the upcoming 3D action adventure game. Slime Heroes will be available on Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and Steam on February 13, 2025. You are the last slime and the only one that can save your home from the corruption consuming it. Play alone or with a friend to find different weapons, dynamically create your own magical abilities, and express the way you want to adventure in this slimes-like action-adventure!
